entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
